verbs.description: [ARG0: Mr. Trump] [V: tweeted] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARG1: his hope that West Virginians would support one of Blankenship 's opponents in Tuesday 's election]
Mr. Trump tweeted on Monday his hope that West Virginians [V: would] support one of Blankenship 's opponents in Tuesday 's election
